titleStmt.title: An ordinance appointing commissioners for approbation of publique preachers. Monday March 20. 1653. Ordered by His Highness the Lord Protector and His Council, that this ordinance be forthwith printed and published. Henry Scobell Clerk of the Council.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
England and Wales. Council of State.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William du-Gard and Henry Hills, Printers to His Highness the Lord Protector,

notesStmt.note: The final leaf contains order to print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
